meanings.definition: A type of cracker or cookie made with whole wheat flour.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on graham crackers.
meanings.sent2: Mom bought a pack of graham cookies for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The graham crackers danced in the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of graham crackers filled the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of graham crackers echoed in the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Grahams is our new neighbor.
meanings.sent2: The teacher called out Grahams during attendance.
meanings.sent3: The Grahams family picnic was a blast.
meanings.sent4: The Grahams name stood out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The Grahams house was painted a cheerful yellow.

meanings.definition: A type of flour made from whole wheat.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for graham flour for a healthier option.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of graham flour for baking bread.
meanings.sent3: The graham flour spilled like sandy gold on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The graham flour mixed into the dough smoothly like magic.
meanings.sent5: The scent of graham flour filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of cracker or cookie made with graham flour.
meanings.sent1: The store had a sale on graham cookies.
meanings.sent2: I packed graham crackers for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The graham cookies giggled in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The graham crackers crumbled like autumn leaves.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of graham cookies lingered on my tongue.
